channel.title: I require assistance in starting my server
channel.description: Ive downloaded moparscapes 3.2 aryan webclient and have gotten myself a server. Now my problem is, how do I get said server online? I can utilize it from my desktop and access the program by simply clicking on the icon and logging in. But no oen else can use the server apparently because I must connect the server to the internet. How do I do this? Insight and enlightenment on this matter would be much appreciated, thank you.

item.title: I require assistance in starting my server
item.dc:creator: @prickly_needle prickly needle
item.description:
@prickly_needle wrote:

Ive downloaded moparscapes 3.2 aryan webclient and have gotten myself a server. Now my problem is, how do I get said server online? I can utilize it from my desktop and access the program by simply clicking on the icon and logging in. But no oen else can use the server apparently because I must connect the server to the internet. How do I do this? Insight and enlightenment on this matter would be much appreciated, thank you.
